summary: A simple TV dashboard application that provides a user-friendly interface for accessing various TV-related information.

features.title: User Profile Management
features.description: Allow users to view and edit their profile information, including name, email, and password.

features.title: Channel Selection
features.description: Provide a list of available TV channels, allowing users to browse and select their favorite channels.

features.title: Content Library
features.description: Offer a collection of pre-loaded TV shows and movies, allowing users to search, play, and bookmark content.
